___action.description: An action to request lookup of a URL by key (data.key)

___resource.description: The lookup result for a URL (url, key, shortUrl)

___action.description: An action to request lookup/insert of a URL (data.url)

___resource.description: The insert result for a URL (url, key, shortUrl)

name: elasticsearch-url-shortener-activity
description: Saves URL shortener mappings to ElasticSearch
